description.name: PidginHost Module
description.tagline: Enhance your online presence with a .ro domain name through PidginHost!
description.description: The PidginHost Registrar Module for WHMCS allows you to register and manage .ro (and more) domains through WHMCS. The module is fully integrated with WHMCS and provides the ability to register, renew, transfer and manage domains from the WHMCS client area. The module also provides the ability to manage domain contacts, nameservers and DNS records.
